About us

About Us

INTEGRITY ALONG WITH COOPERATION- OUR PRIORITIES

Selest was established to meet the pressing security needs of our clients while providing easy and accessible access to quality security services. With a focus on professionalism, dependability, and prevention, we strive to become the top security service provider in the world and set the bar for the industry. With innovative solutions and experienced employees, we put the safety of our clients first.

  • Security Guaranteed
  • Modern monitoring system
  • 24/7 protection
Contact Us

Experience Peace of Mind By Conveniently Ordering Your Security Services Through Our Mobile Application

Our user-friendly mobile application allows you to easily book the services of our individual security agents. With rates starting at $300 for a 4-hour service package per agent*, our streamlined process ensures that your security needs are met professionally and conveniently. You can book appointments up to one month in advance and even renew your reservation within the same month.

To make a reservation, simply download the application, select the type of security service you require, choose the date and time of your appointment, and book your security agent. We take care of the rest.

If you are in need of long-term services, please contact us directly. We will be happy to provide you with a tailored quote based on your specific needs.

Our application is your all-in-one solution for all your security needs.

*conditions may apply

Client

Trusted by world's companies.

GET OUR EXCLUSIVE SECURITY PLUS MEMBERSHIP

As a privileged member, enjoy remote camera surveillance from our surveillance center 24/7, 365 days a year. This package is ideal for businesses, residential public spaces, as well as unoccupied residences, whether for a short or long period. In addition to this continuous surveillance, take advantage of preferential rates on all our security services. Join us today to discover the combined benefits of remote surveillance and exceptional security solutions offered by Selest. Your peace of mind is our priority.

Contact Us

We offer comprehensive security services while taking into account your requirements. Reach out to us for further details.
